ability.name: Blackjack
ability.description: * Place Minor Arcana cards of suit Cup or Sword on Blackjack. * Cards sitting on Blackjack remain there. * When the sum of the numerical values of the cards on Blackjack reaches or exceeds 21: * Deal 2 Damage (Strong: 3 Damage, Weak: 1 Damage), plus 1 additional Damage for every face-down card on Blackjack. * Gain 2 Shield (Fast: 3 Shields, Slow: 1 Shield), plus 1 additional Shield for every face-down card on Blackjack. * Take two of the cards on Blackjack. Play them, face-down, on Blackjack. * Discard all remaining cards on Blackjack. * At the end of combat, discard all cards on Blackjack.
ability.flavor: It looks like you're biding your time, but you're really just waiting for the right moment to strike.
